info.title: Aptoscan.com Public APIs v1.0.0
info.description:
Provide advanced APIs about Accounts, Tokens, NFT Marketplace
Requests litmit: 150 per minute, 10,000 per month

get.summary: Get resources of a specific account
Get modules of a specific account
Get coin list of a specific account
Get token list of a specific account
Get transactions of a specific account
Get coin transfers of a specific account

success.description: Indicates the success status of the transfer

get.summary: Get token transfers of a specific account

success.description: Indicates if the transaction was successful or not

get.summary: Get overview information of a coin
get.description: Get overview information of a coin

parameters.name: coin_type
parameters.description: address values that need to be considered for filter

decimals.description: The number of decimal places for the coin.

current_price.description: The current price of the coin.

change24h_price.description: The change in price over the last 24 hours.

current_num_holder.description: The current number of coin holders.

total_transfer.description: The total number of coin transfers.

total_supply.description: The total supply of the coin.

logo_url.description: The URL of the coin's logo.

project_url.description: The URL of the project related to the coin.

get.summary: Get holders of a specific coin
get.description: Get the list of holders for a specific coin.

success.description: Indicates the success of the request.

decimals.description: The number of decimal places for the coin.

logo_url.description: The URL of the coin's logo.

project_url.description: The URL of the project related to the coin.

owner_address.description: The address of the coin holder.

amount.description: The amount of coins held by the holder.

sum_amount_holder.description: The total amount held by all coin holders.

get.summary: Get transactions for a specific coin
Get coin transfers for an account
Get overview information of a fungible asset
get.description: Get overview information of a fungible asset

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: address values that need to be considered for filter

decimals.description: The number of decimal places for the FA.

current_price.description: The current price of the FA.

change24h_price.description: The change in price over the last 24 hours.

current_num_holder.description: The current number of FA holders.

total_transfer.description: The total number of FA transfers.

total_supply.description: The total supply of the FA.

logo_url.description: The URL of the FA's logo.

project_url.description: The URL of the project related to the coin.

get.summary: Get holders of a specific coin
get.description: Get the list of holders for a specific FA.

success.description: Indicates the success of the request.

decimals.description: The number of decimal places for the FA.

logo_url.description: The URL of the FA's logo.

project_url.description: The URL of the project related to the FA.

owner_address.description: The address of the FA holder.

amount.description: The amount of FA held by the holder.

sum_amount_holder.description: The total amount held by all FA holders.

get.summary: Get transactions for a specific Fungible asset
Get FA transfers for an account
Get FA balances changes for an account
Get list of collections in Aptos
get.description: Get list of collections in Aptos

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Get data by page, each page contains 20 collections.

success.description:
Provides the status of the request:
- `true` for success
- `false` for failure

get.summary: Get information of a specific collection

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Collection address value that needs to be considered for filtering

success.description:
Provides the status of the request:
- `true` for success
- `false` for failure

get.summary: Get NFT list of a specific collection
get.description: Get list NFT tokens of one collection

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Collection address value that need to be considered for filter

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Get data by page, each page contains 20 NFT tokens.

success.description:
Provides the status of the request:
- `true` for success
- `false` for failure

get.summary: Get activities of a specific collection
get.description: Get activities of collection by time descending

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Collection address value that needs to be considered for filtering

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Get data by page, each page contains 20 activities

success.description:
Provides the status of the request:
- `true` for success
- `false` for failure

get.summary: Get holders of a specific collection
get.description: Get addresses who holding NFT tokens of one NFT collection

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Collection address value that needs to be considered for filtering

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Get data by page, each page contains 20 holders

success.description:
Provides the status of the request:
- `true` for success
- `false` for failure

get.summary: Get information of a specific NFT

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: NFT token address that needs to be considered for filtering

success.description:
Provides the status of the request:
- `true` for success
- `false` for failure

get.summary: Get last transactions of blockchain
get.description: Get list last transactions of blockchain. Max 200 last transactions.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Get data by page, each page contains 20 transactions

success.description:
Provides the status of the request:
- `true` for success
- `false` for failure

get.summary: Get detail informaton of a transaction

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Version value that needs to be considered for filtering

success.description:
Provides the status of the request:
- `true` for success
- `false` for failure

get.summary: Get information about last blocks
get.description: Get list last locks. Max 200 last blocks.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Get data by page, each page contains 20 blocks

success.description:
Provides the status of the request:
- `true` for success
- `false` for failure

get.summary: Get detail information of a specific block

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Block value that needs to be considered for filtering

success.description:
Provides the status of the request:
- `true` for success
- `false` for failure

get.summary: Get list of all validators

success.description:
Provides the status of the request:
- `true` for success
- `false` for failure
